rules_text: Whenever you spend snow mana to activate an ability of a snow permanent you control, you may tap Invoker of the Frost Winds, if you do, put a stun counter on it and copy that ability. You may choose new targets for the copy.
notes:

Rank_3
Reason: Just want to confirm we have snow activated abilities for this to copy and that those abilities are within the Naya colors. I think the sizing on this creature can come up regardless.
